mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_sys_dics
code = #{code},
dic_type = #{dicType},
value = #{value},
parent_id = #{parentId},
parent_type = #{parentType},
use_flag = #{useFlag},
type_flag = #{typeFlag},
dic_flag = #{dicFlag},
default_value = #{defaultValue},
order_flag = #{orderFlag},
where id = #{id} or (code = #{code} and parent_id = #{parentId})
